articles.title: National Spaghetti Day 2025: Find deals at Carrabba's, Fazoli's, Gopuff
articles.author: Saleen Martin
articles.summary: Fazoli's is offering $4 spaghetti in celebration of National Spaghetti Day. Carrabba's Italian Grill provides a full-sized spaghetti entrée for $10 with any dine-in entrée purchase. Gopuff is discounting Rao's and Prego pasta products by 15%.

articles.title: Kia K4: this is the new sedan of the Korean brand available in Puerto Rico
articles.author: José Orlando Delgado Rivera
articles.summary: Kia launched the new Kia K4 sedan in Puerto Rico. The new sedan's exterior design distinguishes it.

articles.title: I never knew I wanted a floor lamp that doubles as a projector until LG made one
articles.summary: LG has unveiled the LG lamp projector, a device that functions as both a lamp and a projector, featuring Full HD projection, adjustable settings, and Bluetooth speaker capabilities. Simultaneously, LG introduced the CineBeam S, a compact 4K UST short-throw projector with high color spectrum coverage, designed for quality streaming. However, pricing and release dates for both products are not yet available.

articles.title: Cosmo HQ Review: Glossier's New Black Cherry Collection Is Here, and We Tried Everything
articles.author: Jasmine Hyman
articles.summary: Glossier has launched its Black Cherry Collection, which includes new deep-red tinted versions of Balm Dotcom, Cloud Paint, No. 1 Pencil, and Lip Line. The products are available on glossier.com and sephora.com and have received positive reviews for their color payoff, texture, and longevity.

articles.title: Finally, a 3D printer for the rest of us
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Toybox Alpha One 3D printer, designed for kids but suitable for adults, is available for \$299.97 until January 12. The printer features an easy-to-use app with pre-made designs from DC Comics, Cartoon Network, and Looney Tunes, allowing users to print immediately after downloading the app.

articles.title: 40% girl cadets in NCC, phase-wise expansion planned; 2 bands from Corps to take part in Parade
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Several companies and individuals have launched new online courses and masterclasses. These include topics such as Artificial Intelligence, Performance Marketing, Microsoft Excel, Financial Literacy, Modern Marketing, Vastu Shastra, Succession Planning, Data Science, Web Development, and Digital Marketing. These services are offered by entities like Inara Marketers, elearnmarkets, Seth Godin, Accenture Technology, and others.

articles.title: Want to smell like a Crumbl cookie? Limited-edition beauty line launches at Walmart
articles.author: Jessica Jones-Gorman
articles.summary: Dove and Crumbl have collaborated to launch a limited-edition 'Dove x Crumbl' collection of beauty products, including body wash, scrubs, and deodorant, featuring Crumbl's signature flavors. The collection is available exclusively at Walmart stores nationwide and features pink packaging as a nod to Crumbl's branding.

articles.title: Amazon has the Ninja SLUSHi that's been sold out all winter in-stock and you can have it by next week if you shop fast
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: The Ninja Thirsti Drink System is available for purchase with an estimated delivery window of January 8-10 for both Prime and non-Prime members, sold through Amazon for $570 instead of the regular $300 retail price. This beverage system features a 2.6-liter capacity and a refillable chamber designed to keep beverages flowing for up to 12 hours, making it suitable for various beverage creations.

articles.title: When will Elon Musk launch X TV and X Money and what will be the features?
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: X, previously known as Twitter, intends to launch two new services in 2025. X TV, a streaming platform, will offer live sports, entertainment, and other media content, while X Money will function as a versatile payment platform, potentially including peer-to-peer transfers, e-commerce integration, and cryptocurrency transactions. The launch of X TV and X Money is part of X's strategy to become a comprehensive 'everything app'.

articles.title: HMD's super cheap smartphone costs only $75, but you can't buy it in the U.S.
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: HMD has launched the HMD Key, a new budget-friendly smartphone priced at £59 in the UK (approximately $75). The HMD Key features a 6.52-inch display, a 4,000mAh battery, runs on Android 14 Go, and is available in midnight black and icy blue colors. It is currently available in the UK, Australia, and New Zealand, with no confirmed US release date.

articles.title: When Will I Not Regret Buying an ARM Laptop? January 3, 2025 10:30 AM Subscribe
articles.summary: Microsoft's latest Surface laptop features an ARM processor, which raises concerns about compatibility with existing software. The user is evaluating whether to purchase the new Surface laptop, considering potential issues related to software compatibility, particularly for applications without ARM versions and remote software installation by future employers.

articles.title: Concepts' New Balance 740 Is Inspired by Brut Champagne
articles.author: Victor Deng
articles.summary: Concepts and New Balance are launching the "Brut" colorway of the New Balance 740 sneaker. The "Brut" 740 features a green mesh upper with an orange tongue and a dark green Abzorb-cushioned midsole. It will be available on January 10 for $120 at Concepts stores in New York, Boston, and Miami.

articles.title: AI Achieves Sentience, Commits Suicide
articles.author: Doc Searls
articles.summary: Donald Trump is launching a new line of fragrances, advertised on the website GetTrumpFragrances. A sample of the fragrance is available on the website via video.

articles.title: LG Bringing AI Van Concept To Vegas
articles.author: Evan Williams
articles.summary: LG Electronics is introducing its AI Home tech into the automotive interiors sector, showcasing it as a 'space-as-an-experience' in a futuristic van at CES 2025. The LG Mobility Experience (LX) platform will feature smart solutions to link the vehicle and home, offering services like schedule management, food ordering, and health monitoring through its ThinQ ON AI integration.

articles.title: Google AdSense: A Comprehensive Guide for Website Owners
articles.author: Umair Ishtiaq
articles.summary: Google AdSense enables website owners to earn revenue by displaying targeted ads. Website owners can create an AdSense account and, upon approval, place code snippets on their websites to display ads. Earnings are generated when visitors click on these ads, with the amount dependent on factors like ad placement and click-through rates.

articles.title: Lenovo takes on Samsung and Apple with bargain tablet for less than £200
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Lenovo launched the Tab Plus tablet with a 2K display and JBL speakers, priced at £199, targeting users who enjoy streaming and reading. Lenovo is offering £60 cashback or music streaming credit with the purchase. The article also mentions the Lenovo M10 tablet as a cheaper alternative.

articles.title: Oodie Onesie review: unbelievably undignified and unfathomably comfortable
articles.author: Reviews Manager
articles.summary: The Oodie has launched a new product called the Oodie Onesie, which is exclusively available on The Oodie website. It is made from the same material as the original Oodie and improves on some of the design issues of the original. The Oodie Onesie is currently on sale for £39.

articles.title: A Beginner's Guide to Temu: Your Ultimate Shopping Companion
articles.author: Business Post Contributor
articles.summary: NDDC launched the U-lesson tabs, and Project Hope, and is distributing tablets to schools across the region to improve students' cognitive skills and learning abilities. The commission also has the Project Hope, and the youth internship scheme which is designed to empower 10,000 youths across the nine NDDC states.

articles.title: NSDC International partners with IDP India to enhance global employability of skilled Indian professionals
articles.author: Sreeradha Basu
articles.summary: NSDC International and IDP India have partnered to launch a learning and testing ecosystem. This includes digital tools, online and offline training modules, and customized programs aimed at enhancing the global employability of Indian professionals and providing IELTS certification. The program aims to benefit 75,000 skilled professionals over the next two years.

articles.title: 20 Ways To Make Your Home Look Cleaner Than It Is In 2025
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: TS Designs is offering reusable Swiffer duster heads as an alternative to disposable ones. Screen Mom offers gentle, streak-free cleaning solutions for screens. Birthdate Co. creates personalized candles and books with astrological information. These products aim to provide solutions for keeping homes clean and organized.

articles.title: Year in review: 2024's top Amazon products according to readers
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: Finish offers Jet Dry Rinse Aid to prevent wet and spotty dishes. Subi provides Raw Greens Superfood Powder in unflavored and pineapple mango versions. Polysporin produces Triple Antibiotic Ointment for healing minor wounds.

articles.title: I found a gorgeous sofa worth £1400 for just £250 in a little-known furniture shop – I won't buy full-priced items again
articles.author: Rhiannon Oliver
articles.summary: Next is offering discounted sofas at its outlet store in Croydon. The outlet features sofas, including floral and velvet options, with prices significantly reduced from their original values.

articles.title: Nano and Advanced Materials Institute (NAMI) to Unveil its Smart Products and New Collaboration at CES 2025
articles.summary: NAMI is set to unveil its smart products. They are also launching a new collaboration hand-out.

articles.title: RoboSense Unveils AI Robotics Strategy and Cutting-Edge Innovations at 2025 Global Launch Event
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: RoboSense, an AI-driven robotics technology company, hosted the "Hello Robot" Global Online Launch Event of 2025. The event introduced advancements in robotics technology platforms.

articles.title: Microsoft Edge started 2024 with a 'new' name. The browser starts 2025 asking for beta testers.
articles.author: Sean Endicott
articles.summary: Microsoft is inviting iOS users to beta test its Edge browser through Apple TestFlight, offering early access to new features. Furthermore, Microsoft rebranded Edge mobile to "AI Browser" on iOS and Android, integrating Copilot for AI-powered features like article summarization.

articles.title: New store selling robots that do housework to open on Birmingham New Street
articles.author: Kirsty Bosley
articles.summary: Dreame, a smart home cleaning brand, is launching its first offline store at the Bullring end of a shopping street. The store will feature Dreame's robot vacuums, mops, high-speed hair dryers, and lawnmowers, and the company is developing robotic lawnmowers, cordless robotic pool cleaners, and commercial food delivery robots for future release.

articles.title: RoboSense Unveils AI Robotics Strategy and Cutting-Edge Innovations at 2025 Global Launch Event
articles.author: Robo Sense Technology Co.
articles.summary: RoboSense hosted the "Hello Robot" online launch event, showcasing its strategic vision as a global robotics technology platform. The company unveiled cutting-edge products that will debut at CES 2025 in Las Vegas.

articles.title: Claudia Winkleman swears by best-selling No7 product that 'reverses skin damage'
articles.author: Tiffany Lo
articles.summary: No7 launched the Future Renew UV Defence Shield SPF 50 sunscreen in April. The sunscreen is formulated to protect against sun damage with age-defying peptide technology and hydrating sodium hyaluronate. The Future Renew range includes other products like day cream, night cream, serum, and an eye cream.

articles.title: Samsung Big TV Days sale: Discount on premium range of Samsung Neo QLED, OLED, and 4K UHD TVs
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its 'Big TV Days' sale, offering discounts and benefits on its Neo QLED 8K, Neo QLED 4K, OLED, and 4K UHD TV models. These AI-powered TVs feature technologies like the NQ8 AI Gen2 Processor and Quantum Matrix Technology, promising enhanced picture quality and immersive experiences. The sale is available on Samsung.com, major online portals, and Samsung retail outlets across India.

articles.title: Posiflex to Showcase Multiple Point-of-Sale Solutions with Advanced Design and Intelligence at NRF 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Posiflex is launching several new products including a highly modular terminal, an intelligently designed tablet with customizable buttons, and a terminal with a unique clamshell casing. The company will also unveil AI-enhanced customized self-service kiosks featuring interactive voice commands, RFID-enabled scanning, and intelligent camera-assisted weight scales.

articles.title: Enjoy convenient, cost-effective printing with HP Instant Ink delivered right to your doorstep for as low as $1.49
articles.author: Julia Remillard
articles.summary: HP is offering HP Instant Ink, a subscription program for ink delivery with prices starting at $1.49 per month. Subscribers can choose from various plans based on their printing needs, with options ranging from 10 to 700 pages per month, and receive ink refills automatically. Customers can also add printing necessities such as HP paper to their monthly package.

articles.title: Top 10 free AI business name generator to try in 2025
articles.author: Sarah Dunsby
articles.summary: Several companies offer AI business name generators, which are rapidly growing in popularity. Companies like Noiz, Shopify, Namelix, Wix, NameSnack, Looka, BrandCrowd, Namify, Copy.ai, and Hostinger each provide unique features such as domain checking, trademark compliance, logo design, and various name styles. Noiz AI Business Name Generator is highlighted for its complete features and user-friendly design.

articles.title: Top finds for a stress-free post-holiday cleanup
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: Saje offers a Multi-Surface Cleaning Kit with plant-based ingredients and natural essential oils for eco-friendly cleaning. Saje also provides Natural Wool Dryer Balls & Laundry Blend to soften clothes and reduce drying time with a chemical-free scent. Several other cleaning products and appliances are also introduced from other different companies including Puracy's natural all-purpose cleaner, robot vacuum and mop combo, handheld hard surface steam cleaner, and electric scrubber.

articles.title: Samsung is handing out free laptops thanks to special Galaxy S24 offer
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Samsung is offering free gifts like laptops and earbuds with the purchase of new phones. The S24 Ultra boasts features such as an excellent display, S Pen stylus, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, versatile cameras, and new Galaxy AI features. Samsung commits to seven years of Android and security updates.

articles.title: Samsung rival launches budget Android phone with mega battery that lasts up to three days and free gift worth £149
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: Honor has launched the Magic7 Lite smartphone featuring a 6600mAh battery that lasts up to three days, improved ultra bounce anti-drop technology, and a 108-megapixel camera. Retailing at £399, the phone is available from January 15, and Honor is offering a free pair of earphones worth £149 for a limited time.

articles.title: New iQOO Z9 Turbo Long Battery Life Edition launched
articles.author: GCC Business News
articles.summary: iQOO launched the iQOO Z9 Turbo Long Battery Life Edition. This new edition offers improved features and extended battery performance. The Long Battery Life Edition is an enhanced version of the original iQoo Z9 Turbo.

articles.title: Top 10 AI Tools That Will Transform Your Content Creation in 2025
articles.author: Adil Ahmad
articles.summary: ChatGPT is presented as a comprehensive content creation assistant with advanced language understanding and optimization features. Canva Magic Studio combines a user-friendly interface with AI capabilities for visual design and social media content creation. Both tools are positioned as revolutionary solutions for content creators, offering features like content generation, SEO optimization, brand voice maintenance, and AI design generation.

articles.title: Peter Crouch stars in Ariel TV ad for The Big One laundry pods
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Ariel launched 'The Big One' laundry pods on December 26th in Tesco stores. The product, designed for tougher loads, features enhanced stain and odor removal and includes a built-in pre-treat. Peter Crouch is starring in a TV ad campaign to promote the new product.

articles.title: Do you have a favorite glass cleaner for windshields?
articles.author: John Paul
articles.summary: Gyraline Corp is a small company that offers a DIY alignment system using a phone. The company was asked to provide their DIY alignment tool for evaluation. This DIY tool is positioned as a cheaper alternative to traditional alignment machines.

articles.title: Svdaa: Redefining Beauty With Innovative And Natural Skincare Solutions
articles.author: Zeenews
articles.summary: Subhash Ramdin Prajapati developed Svdaa, a new beauty brand. The inspiration was to enable young men and women to fulfill their desire to look beautiful.

articles.title: Svdaa: Redefining Beauty With Innovative And Natural Skincare Solutions
articles.summary: Svdaa, a new Indian beauty brand, has launched a range of skin-friendly products combining Ayurveda and herbal ingredients. The product range includes face wash, anti-pollution massage gel, day cream, and night cream, designed to protect, care for, and nourish the skin using natural extracts. The company aims to provide high-quality products at affordable prices globally.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A06 Now Available Below ₹9,000: Affordable Smartphone Packed with Features
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy A06, a new smartphone priced below ₹9,000, featuring a 5000mAh battery and a dual-camera setup. It is powered by the MediaTek Helio G85 chipset and runs on Android v14. The device is available on Amazon with special offers on select bank credit card EMI transactions.

articles.title: White On White is Now Expanding to Singapore with a Range of Hand-Crafted Fresh Flower Bouquets
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: White On White, a Malaysian premium rose bouquet brand, has announced the expansion of its high-quality fresh flower bouquet range to Singapore, offering delivery services. The brand provides a variety of meticulously crafted bouquet collections featuring roses, sunflowers, and other fresh flowers, with options for same-day delivery.

articles.title: Social media cheers Blinkit's rollout of 10-minute ambulance service
articles.summary: Blinkit launched a 10-minute ambulance service in Gurugram, with plans to expand to other major cities in the next two years. The service is accessible through the Blinkit app and represents the company's move to broaden its offerings beyond groceries and consumer goods.

articles.title: Realme Neo 7 SE Set to Launch in China with MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Realme is preparing to launch the Realme Neo 7 SE smartphone in China in February 2025, powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset and featuring a substantial 7,000mAh battery. Expected to be priced around CNY 1,799, the Neo 7 SE is positioned as a budget-friendly alternative with strong performance, with potential for a rebranded global release.

articles.title: Luckin Coffee Rings in the Year of the Snake with Limited-Edition Apple Fizzy Americano and Ceylon Yuan-Yang
articles.author: Irone Kim
articles.summary: Luckin Coffee is launching two limited-edition beverages, the Apple Fizzy Americano and the Ceylon Yuan-Yang, to celebrate the Lunar New Year. The Apple Fizzy Americano, available from 1 January 2025, combines apple juice, soda, and Americano coffee, while the Ceylon Yuan-Yang, available from 24 January 2025, blends Ceylon black tea, milk, and espresso.

articles.title: Cellphone prices are very different, take a peek at the specifications of the Samsung Galaxy A55 5G vs Oppo Find X8 Pro, which is the most sophisticated?
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Whispers of a new Samsung addition, the Galaxy A56, have generated excitement. Speculation includes the possibility of a revolutionary camera system, a powerful processor, or a stunning display.

articles.title: Nordstrom has Tory Burch's bestselling work-ready zip tote on sale for up to 40% off in all three colorways
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Tory Burch's 'Ever-Ready Zip Tote,' a best-selling, lightweight, water-resistant coated canvas bag, is designed with a top-zip closure and slim shoulder straps. The tote features a spacious interior with chevron lining and a removable tethered zip pouch, suitable for carrying laptops, tablets, and everyday essentials.

articles.title: Windsurf Cascade uses AI to help beginners code games and applications
articles.author: Jeremy Caplan
articles.summary: Windsurf Cascade, a new AI service, enables users to create games and apps without needing to code. Users provide prompts to the AI, which generates code that can be tested and revised, allowing for easy app creation and sharing.

articles.title: 34 Genuinely Cool TikTok-Approved Things You Won't Forget About 5 Seconds After You Scroll By
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several new products and services are highlighted, including the NeeDoh "Dream Drop" fidget toy, Cremo moisturizing body wash, Nuts 'N More Chocolate Maple Pretzel Peanut Butter Spread, Lumify Eye Drops, E.l.f's brand new Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, Death Wish Instant Coffee Packets, Dazzle Dry mini kit for nails , MagicMinerals AirBrush Foundation and many others. These products span various categories like beauty, food, and lifestyle, emphasizing their unique features and availability.

articles.title: this year's first smartphone offers high durability and a record-breaking battery
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching its new mid-range smartphone, the Redmi Turbo 4, in China, featuring enhanced water resistance and durable build. It comes in two storage options and the global version is expected to launch as the Poco X7 Pro on January 9th.

articles.title: Amazon has the Ninja SLUSHi that's been sold out all winter in-stock and you can ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Ninja SLUSHi is now available on Amazon after a period of high demand and limited availability. The product's launch or availability update makes it accessible to consumers who have been waiting.

articles.title: Get to know more about PYG – Their Range of Products
articles.author: Get News
org: Zhejiang Pengyin Technology & Development Co., Ltd
articles.summary: Zhejiang Pengyin Technology & Development Co., Ltd. launched the "PYG" brand in 2022. This launch completes an iterative upgrade and directly standardizes ultra-high precision manufacturing within the company.

articles.title: Limited Time Offer: Domain and Hosting Signup PHP Software with Hosting Template - $15
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart offers a PHP script designed as a cost-effective alternative to WHMCS for domain and web hosting ordering. The script features an ajax domain checker with whois lookup, streamlining the process of adding domains and hosting packages to the shopping cart, all managed from a single page. domainCart supports the sale of domain names and offers the option to enable hosting package sales.
